001package ca.gc.cra.radar.validation;
002
003import java.io.IOException;
004import java.nio.file.DirectoryStream;
005import java.nio.file.Files;
006import java.nio.file.LinkOption;
007import java.nio.file.Path;
008
009/**
010 * Path validation helpers to guard CLI/config supplied directories.
011 */
012public final class Paths {
013  private Paths() {
014    // Utility
015  }
016
017  /**
018   * Validates a directory path ensuring it is writable and safe to use.
019   *
020   * @param path candidate path
021   * @return canonical path when available, otherwise absolute normalized path
022   */
023  public static Path validateWritableDir(Path path) {
024    return validateWritableDir(path, null, false, false);
025  }
026
027  /**
028   * Validates a directory path ensuring it stays within an allowed base directory.
029   *
030   * @param path candidate path
031   * @param allowedBase optional base directory constraint
032   * @param createIfMissing whether the directory should be created when missing
033   * @param allowReuse when {@code false}, non-empty directories are rejected
034   * @return canonical path when available, otherwise absolute normalized path
035   */
036  public static Path validateWritableDir(Path path, Path allowedBase, boolean createIfMissing, boolean allowReuse) {
037    if (path == null) {
038      throw new IllegalArgumentException("path must not be null");
039    }
040    String raw = path.toString();
041    if (raw.indexOf('\0') >= 0) {
042      throw new IllegalArgumentException("path must not contain null bytes");
043    }
044    if (containsControl(raw)) {
045      throw new IllegalArgumentException("path must not contain control characters");
046    }
047
048    Path normalized = path.toAbsolutePath().normalize();
049    Path base = allowedBase == null ? null : allowedBase.toAbsolutePath().normalize();
050    ensureWithinBase(normalized, base);
051
052    try {
053      if (Files.exists(normalized, LinkOption.NOFOLLOW_LINKS)) {
054        Path real = normalized.toRealPath(LinkOption.NOFOLLOW_LINKS);
055        ensureWithinBase(real, base);
056        ensureDirectory(real, allowReuse);
057        return real;
058      }
059
060      Path parent = normalized.getParent();
061      if (parent == null) {
062        throw new IllegalArgumentException("path has no parent to validate: " + normalized);
063      }
064      Path parentNormalized = parent.toAbsolutePath().normalize();
065      ensureWithinBase(parentNormalized, base);
066      Path parentReal;
067      if (!Files.exists(parentNormalized, LinkOption.NOFOLLOW_LINKS)) {
068        if (createIfMissing) {
069          Files.createDirectories(parentNormalized);
070          parentReal = parentNormalized.toRealPath(LinkOption.NOFOLLOW_LINKS);
071        } else {
072          parentReal = nearestExistingAncestor(parentNormalized);
073        }
074      } else {
075        parentReal = parentNormalized.toRealPath(LinkOption.NOFOLLOW_LINKS);
076      }
077      ensureWithinBase(parentReal, base);
078      if (!Files.isDirectory(parentReal, LinkOption.NOFOLLOW_LINKS)) {
079        throw new IllegalArgumentException("parent is not a directory: " + parentReal);
080      }
081      if (!Files.isWritable(parentReal)) {
082        throw new IllegalArgumentException("parent directory is not writable: " + parentReal);
083      }
084      if (createIfMissing) {
085        Files.createDirectories(normalized);
086        Path real = normalized.toRealPath(LinkOption.NOFOLLOW_LINKS);
087        ensureWithinBase(real, base);
088        ensureDirectory(real, allowReuse);
089        return real;
090      }
091      return normalized;
092    } catch (IOException ex) {
093      throw new IllegalArgumentException("unable to validate directory " + normalized + ": " + ex.getMessage(), ex);
094    }
095  }
096
097  private static void ensureDirectory(Path dir, boolean allowReuse) throws IOException {
098    if (!Files.isDirectory(dir, LinkOption.NOFOLLOW_LINKS)) {
099      throw new IllegalArgumentException("path is not a directory: " + dir);
100    }
101    if (!Files.isWritable(dir)) {
102      throw new IllegalArgumentException("directory is not writable: " + dir);
103    }
104    if (!allowReuse) {
105      try (DirectoryStream<Path> entries = Files.newDirectoryStream(dir)) {
106        if (entries.iterator().hasNext()) {
107          throw new IllegalArgumentException(
108              "directory " + dir + " is not empty; re-run with --allow-overwrite to reuse");
109        }
110      }
111    }
112  }
113
114  private static void ensureWithinBase(Path candidate, Path base) {
115    if (base == null) {
116      return;
117    }
118    if (!candidate.startsWith(base)) {
119      throw new IllegalArgumentException("path " + candidate + " escapes allowed base " + base);
120    }
121  }
122
123  private static Path nearestExistingAncestor(Path start) throws IOException {
124    Path current = start;
125    while (current != null && !Files.exists(current, LinkOption.NOFOLLOW_LINKS)) {
126      current = current.getParent();
127    }
128    if (current == null) {
129      throw new IllegalArgumentException("no existing ancestor for " + start);
130    }
131    return current.toRealPath(LinkOption.NOFOLLOW_LINKS);
132  }
133
134  private static boolean containsControl(CharSequence value) {
135    for (int i = 0; i < value.length(); i++) {
136      if (Character.isISOControl(value.charAt(i))) {
137        return true;
138      }
139    }
140    return false;
141  }
142}
143
144
